1.question: What is Tools-Ai.xyz?
1.answer: Tools -Ai.xyz -This website aims to help you get your favorite AI applications. You can find AI writing tools, AI marketing tools, AI rewriting tools, AI SEO tools, AI learning tools, AI generation tools, AI research tools, AI art tools, AI music tools, AI video tools, AI encoding tools, AI AI Image tools and so on.

2.question: How to find your AI application in Tools-Ai.xyz?
2.answer-3: 3. Click the AI ​​application you need, check the details and visit it.

3.question: What is the main function of Tools-Ai.xyz?
3.answer-1: 1. Free AI application list: Here you find your favorite AI application is free.
3.answer-2: 2. Startup List: Free startup list for AI application developers.

4.question: Is it free to submit AI applications to Tools-Ai.xyz?
4.answer: Yes, it is currently free. But you should share the rear link of Tools-Ai.xyz!

5.question: What AI application categories support for Tools-Ai.xyz?
5.answer: We will support all types of AI in the future. Please wait a few days.

6.question: What is the update frequency of AI applications in Tools-AI.XYZ?
6.answer: The AI ​​list will be updated every day.

7.question: Does GPT-4O or Sora AI support here?
7.answer: You can get GPT-4O or Sora AI applications here. Here are the introduction of GPT-4O and Sora videos, you can access the application website.

8.question: troubleshooting
8.answer: If the content does not appear, try other browsers to clear the cache. If the problem still exists, please contact us: admin@tools-ai.xyz.

9.question: How is the content of Tools-Ai.xyz generated?
9.answer: The description of the AI ​​application is generated by OPENAI's GPT-4O.

10.question: What is the right to use Tools-Ai.xyz?
10.answer: Tools-AI.XYZ is just a directory for AI applications. The right to use AI applications is based on AI applications.

privacyPolicy.1-p: This page is used to notify visitors' policies on collecting, using and disclosing personal information, and if anyone decides to use my service. If you choose to use my service, you agree that you agree to collect and use information related to this policy. The personal information I collected is used to provide and improve services. Unless otherwise explained in this privacy policy, I will not share your information with anyone. The terms used in this privacy policy have the same meaning as the terms in our terms and conditions.
privacyPolicy.2-p: In order to provide better services, when using our services, I may ask you to provide some information that can identify your personal identity. The information I requested will be stored on your device, and I will not collect in any way. This application uses a third -party service that may collect to identify your information.
privacyPolicy.3-p: I want to tell you that whenever you use my service and the application is wrong, I will collect data and information on your mobile phone (through third -party products). These log data may include your device IP address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of your service, the time and date of your service service, and other statistical information.
privacyPolicy.4-p: Cookie is a small paragraph data, which is usually used as anonymous unique identifier. These data are sent to your browser through the website you visit and stored in the memory of your device. This service is unclear to use these "cookies". However, the application may use a third -party code and library, which uses "cookie" to collect information and improve their services. You can choose to accept or reject these cookies and know when to send cookies to your device. If you choose to reject our cookies, you may not be able to use some parts of this service.
privacyPolicy.5-p-1: I may hire third -party companies and individuals for the following reasons:
privacyPolicy.5-li-2: On behalf of us to provide services;
privacyPolicy.5-li-4: Help us analyze the usage of the service;
privacyPolicy.5-p-2: I want to tell users of this service that these third parties can access your personal information. The reason is that we do the tasks assigned to them. However, they are obliged to disclose or use this information for other purposes.
privacyPolicy.6-p: I value your trust in our personal information, so we are committed to protecting it with a business -acceptable means. But please remember that there is no one that through the Internet transmission method or electronic storage method is 100%secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee that it is absolutely safe.
privacyPolicy.7-p: This service may include a link to other websites. If you click on a third -party link, you will be guided to the website. Please note that these external websites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly recommend that you check the privacy policies of these websites. I cannot control it, nor do I assume the content, privacy policy or practice of any third -party websites or services.
privacyPolicy.8-p: I may update our privacy policy from time to time. Therefore, it is recommended that you check any changes on this page. I will notify you any changes by publishing a new privacy policy on this page. These changes took effect immediately after publishing on this page.

termsConditions.1-p: Welcome to Tools-Ai.xyz! Our website is located at http://tools-1.xyz ("website"), and is committed to providing you with the ability to create custom images. By visiting or using our website, you agree to be subject to these service terms ("terms"). If you do not agree with any terms, the website is prohibited.
termsConditions.2-p: You are awarded a limited, non -exclusive, and non -transfer license, and this website and its services are used for individual and non -commercial purposes. Without our written consent in advance, this license does not include any rights to replicate, modify or distribute the content of this website or use it for business purposes.
termsConditions.3-p: The ownership of the image generated from the text on the website belongs to the person who creates the image. Tools-Ai.xyz does not claim ownership to the image created by users.
termsConditions.4-p: We collect personal data (name, email, and payment information) and non -personal data (webcie) to improve our services. Using this data is bound by our privacy policy, it can be in

termsConditions.6-p: Tools-Ai.xyz retains the right to modify or replace these clauses at any time when we decide to modify or replace these terms at all. We will notify the user any changes by email. After these clauses are changed, you continue to use this website to constitute your acceptance of these changes.
termsConditions.7-p: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us: admin@tools-ai.xyz.
termsConditions.last-p: Using Tools-Ai.xyz means you accept these service terms.
